entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
